snippet: Socrates Sculpture Park in Long Island City will be given a freestanding educational studio from the Whitney Museum that has been set up for two years in the museum’s sculpture court.
abstract: Socrates Sculpture Park in Long Island City will be given a freestanding educational studio from the Whitney Museum that has been set up for two years in the museum’s sculpture court.

headline.main: Whitney Museum to Donate Studio to Socrates Sculpture Park
